title: Championship Round Preview
description:
Benjamin, Kaelen, and Steven begin the pod by reacting to the recent head-coaching news around the NFL. They then discuss, dissect, and share their picks for both of the championship-round matchups.
Chiefs-Bengals (3:17)
Rams-49ers (24:47)
Hosts: Benjamin Solak, Kaelen Jones, Steven Ruiz
Production Assistant: Chris Sutton
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
